sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE167510 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FORM_CD , FNM , RESNO , TNM , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , TDMR_DDC_AMT , PBT_DDC_AMT , DRTP_CARD_DDC_AMT , TOTA_SNW_AMT , MINM_USE_AMT , DDC_EXCL_AMT , ADD_DDCRT_DDC_AMT , DDC_PSB_AMT , DDC_LMT_AMT , GNRL_DDC_AMT , TDMR_ADD_DDC_AMT , PBT_ADD_DDC_AMT , LST_DDC_AMT , FTYR_PRS_CRDC_USE_AMT , PYR_PRS_CRDC_USE_AMT1 , FTYR_PRS_ADD_DDCRT_AMT , TY_YR_TFHY_PRS_ADD_DDCRT_AMT , CRDC_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #formCd# , #fnm# , #resno# , #tnm# , #bsnoEncCntn# , #tdmrDdcAmt# , #pbtDdcAmt# , #drtpCardDdcAmt# , #totaSnwAmt# , #minmUseAmt# , #ddcExclAmt# , #addDdcrtDdcAmt# , #ddcPsbAmt# , #ddcLmtAmt# , #gnrlDdcAmt# , #tdmrAddDdcAmt# , #pbtAddDdcAmt# , #lstDdcAmt# , #ftyrPrsCrdcUseAmt# , #pyrPrsCrdcUseAmt1# , #ftyrPrsAddDdcrtAmt# , #tyYrTfhyPrsAddDdcrtAmt# , #crdcDdcAmt# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE167510 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , FORM_CD=#formCd# , FNM=#fnm# , RESNO=#resno# , TNM=#tnm# , BSNO_ENC_CNTN=#bsnoEncCntn# , TDMR_DDC_AMT=#tdmrDdcAmt# , PBT_DDC_AMT=#pbtDdcAmt# , DRTP_CARD_DDC_AMT=#drtpCardDdcAmt# , TOTA_SNW_AMT=#totaSnwAmt# , MINM_USE_AMT=#minmUseAmt# , DDC_EXCL_AMT=#ddcExclAmt# , ADD_DDCRT_DDC_AMT=#addDdcrtDdcAmt# , DDC_PSB_AMT=#ddcPsbAmt# , DDC_LMT_AMT=#ddcLmtAmt# , GNRL_DDC_AMT=#gnrlDdcAmt# , TDMR_ADD_DDC_AMT=#tdmrAddDdcAmt# , PBT_ADD_DDC_AMT=#pbtAddDdcAmt# , LST_DDC_AMT=#lstDdcAmt# , FTYR_PRS_CRDC_USE_AMT=#ftyrPrsCrdcUseAmt# , PYR_PRS_CRDC_USE_AMT1=#pyrPrsCrdcUseAmt1# , FTYR_PRS_ADD_DDCRT_AMT=#ftyrPrsAddDdcrtAmt# , TY_YR_TFHY_PRS_ADD_DDCRT_AMT=#tyYrTfhyPrsAddDdcrtAmt# , CRDC_DDC_AMT=#crdcDdcAmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE167510 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FORM_CD , FNM , RESNO , TNM , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , TDMR_DDC_AMT , PBT_DDC_AMT , DRTP_CARD_DDC_AMT , TOTA_SNW_AMT , MINM_USE_AMT , DDC_EXCL_AMT , ADD_DDCRT_DDC_AMT , DDC_PSB_AMT , DDC_LMT_AMT , GNRL_DDC_AMT , TDMR_ADD_DDC_AMT , PBT_ADD_DDC_AMT , LST_DDC_AMT , FTYR_PRS_CRDC_USE_AMT , PYR_PRS_CRDC_USE_AMT1 , FTYR_PRS_ADD_DDCRT_AMT , TY_YR_TFHY_PRS_ADD_DDCRT_AMT , CRDC_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167510 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FORM_CD , FNM , RESNO , TNM , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , TDMR_DDC_AMT , PBT_DDC_AMT , DRTP_CARD_DDC_AMT , TOTA_SNW_AMT , MINM_USE_AMT , DDC_EXCL_AMT , ADD_DDCRT_DDC_AMT , DDC_PSB_AMT , DDC_LMT_AMT , GNRL_DDC_AMT , TDMR_ADD_DDC_AMT , PBT_ADD_DDC_AMT , LST_DDC_AMT , FTYR_PRS_CRDC_USE_AMT , PYR_PRS_CRDC_USE_AMT1 , FTYR_PRS_ADD_DDCRT_AMT , TY_YR_TFHY_PRS_ADD_DDCRT_AMT , CRDC_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167510 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE167510 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
